value.title: China publishes code of ethics to regulate Artificial Intelligence, what would Isaac Asimov say?
value.excerpt: Going ahead of Europe, China has already published a six-point code of ethics to regulate Artificial Intelligence, giving 'full decision-making power' to humans, very similar to Isaac Asimov's laws of robotics.
